title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) - INITIAL VISIT PACKETFORM A1V2: SUBJECT DEMOGRAPHICS
description: INSTRUCTIONS: This form is to be completed by intake interviewer based on ADC scheduling records,subject interview, medical records, and proxy co-participant report (as needed),For additional clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Initial Visit Packet.Form A1. Check only one box per question.
comment: Schema for submitting UDS_ivp_A1V2 form information.

reason.title: 2. Primary reason for coming to ADC:

reasonx.title: 2a. Other primary reason for coming to ADC – specify
reasonx.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).

refer.title: 3. Principal referral source:
refer.description: (if answer is 1 or 2, CONTINUE TO QUESTION 2B; otherwise, SKIP TO QUESTION 3.)

referx.title: 3a. Principal referral source, other – specify
referx.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes ('‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).

birthmo.title: 7a. Subject's month of birth(MM)
birthmo.description: Date can be submitted as MM.

birthyr.title: 7b. Subject's year of birth(YYYY)
birthyr.description: Date can be submitted as YYYY.

hispanic.title: 9. Does the subject report being of Hispanic/Latino ethnicity (i.e. having origins from a mainly Spanish-speaking Latin American country), regardless of race?
enum: 0 No (If No, SKIP TO QUESTION 10, RACE)
9 Unknown (If Unknown, SKIP TO QUESTION 10, RACE)

hispor.title: 9a. If yes, what are the subject's reported origins?

hisporx.title: 9a1. Other (specify subjects reported origins):
hisporx.description: (Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes ("), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).)

race.title: 10. What does subject report as his or her race?
enum: 4 Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

racex.title: 10a. Other (specify subjects race):
racex.description: (Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes ("), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).)

racesec.title: 11. What additional race does subject report?
enum: 4 Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

racesecx.title: 11a. Other (specify subject's additional race):
racesecx.description: (Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes ("), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).)

raceter.title: 12. What additional race, beyond what was indicated above in questions 9 and 10, does subject report?
enum: 4 Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

raceterx.title: 12a. Other (specify subject's additonal race beyond questions 9 and 10):
raceterx.description: (Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes ("), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).)

primlanx.title: 13a. Other (specify subject's primary language):
primlanx.description: (Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes ("), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).)

educ.title: 14. Subject's years of education-(Use the codes here to report the level achieved; if an attempted level is not completed, enter the number of years completed.)
educ.description: 12 = High school or GED,16 = Bachelor's degree,18 = Master's degree,20 = Doctorate,99 = Unknown

livsit.title: 15. What is the subject's living situation?

livsitx.title: 15a. Living situation, other – specify
livsitx.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).

independ.title: 16. What is the subject's level of independence?
enum: 2 Requires some assistance with complex activities
3 Requires some assistance with basic activities

residenc.title: 17. What is the subject's primary type of residence?

residenx.title: 17a. Type of residence, other – specify
residenx.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).

zip.title: 18. ZIP Code (first three digits) of subject's primary residence:
zip.description: (ZIP Code can be blank if unknown, in the range 006-999)

maristax.title: 19a. Marital status, other – specify
maristax.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).

handed.title: 20. Is the subject left- or right- handed (for example, which hand would s/he normally use to write or throw a ball)?

reason.title: 2. Primary reason for coming to ADC:

reasonx.title: 2a. Other primary reason for coming to ADC – specify
